docs.title: Blogs
docs.text: Yaparla Bhargavi | Blog Yaparla Bhargavi | Blog Aspiring Data Story Teller & Developer - Career, Projects, and Learning My Journey at FOSS United 2025 Event Reflection — Bangalore — September 29, 2025            Sharing the highlights and community lessons from attending FOSS United 2025. Open source, collaboration, and inspiration for student techies.          Easy Guide to Prompt Engineering AI — August 24, 2025            Tips and steps for mastering prompt engineering, from building great queries to optimizing output for real-world machine learning projects.          Teachable Machine: No-Code AI Creativity ML Experiments — June 20, 2025            Learning how to build and teach machine learning models without programming, and how students can use these tools in creative projects.          LinkedIn Is Evolving — And So Should We Career — June 18, 2025            Why professional storytelling matters on LinkedIn, and strategies for standing out by sharing impactful experiences and lessons.          Tiger Analytics: Practical AI for Business Conference Insights — May 18, 2025            Takeaways from PyConf Hyderabad: learning how Tiger Analytics applies machine learning for smarter business decisions.          About the Author          Yaparla Bhargavi is a Data Science student, web developer, aspiring storyteller from Andhra Pradesh. She loves writing about data, technology, career skills, and sharing lessons with her peers.        Connect Medium GitHub LinkedIn

docs.title: About
docs.text:
Yaparla Bhargavi

Data Science Student · Aspiring Data Analyst

docs.title: 👩‍💻 About Me
docs.text:
I'm Yaparla Bhargavi, currently pursuing my B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science, 2023–2027) at Rajeev Gandhi Memorial College of Engineering and Technology, Nandyal. My CGPA is 8.0.

My main interests are Machine Learning, Data Visualization, and Full-Stack Web Development. Driven by curiosity, I strive to convert complex problems into solutions with code and data. Collaboration and continuous learning are my values as I prepare for a professional technology career.

docs.title: Code, Data, Change: Building a Better Narrative
docs.text: I am a story writer of my data ✍️, translating complex datasets into clear, impactful narratives using Python 🐍, Excel 📈, and advanced visualization techniques. My current focus is on mastering these tools to unlock deeper insights. My ultimate ambition is to harness the power of machine learning 🤖 not just for analysis, but for societal impact 🌍. All my projects are steps toward building solutions that genuinely benefit the community. Let's connect and turn data into meaningful action! ✨

docs.title: 💻 Technical Skills & Toolkit
docs.text: A selection of languages, libraries, and tools that power my projects:

docs.title: 🎓 Education
docs.text:
B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering (Data Science), Rajeev Gandhi Memorial College of Engineering and Technology, Nandyal, CGPA 8.0 (2023–2027)

“Code. Create. Connect. Learn endlessly.”

docs.title: Projects
docs.text: These projects demonstrate my skills with data science, business intelligence, and secure web app development.

docs.title: BlinkIT Sales Dashboard (Power BI)
docs.text:
An interactive Power BI dashboard visualizing BlinkIT sales, KPIs, and outlet analytics.

  • Built for business users to track performance and trends
  • Advanced data modeling, cleaning, and DAX measures View on GitHub ›

docs.title: Amazon Sales Report Analysis
docs.text:
A comprehensive Python analysis pipeline for Amazon sales data.

  • Data ingestion, cleaning, Pandas/NumPy-driven report generation
  • Helps uncover critical sales insights for decision-making View on GitHub ›

docs.title: Secure Streamlit Data App
docs.text:
A Streamlit web application with secure login and real SQL database connectivity.

  • Enables authenticated, role-based data access behind a friendly UI
  • Simulates a real-world enterprise data platform View on GitHub ›
